## Exp2Node class

Computes the base-2 exponential function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Exp2Node extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns 2^x (2 raised to the power x). Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
